title: Famous history of the life of King Henry the Eighth
brief_description: Shakespeare’s “The famous history of the life of Henry the eigth” featuring John Stride as Henry VIII and Claire Bloom as Catherine of Aragon. One of thirty-seven plays produced by the BBC over a period of six years.
